text:
Waheeda wins big honour

Veteran actor Waheeda Rehman has been given a special award for her contribution to the film industry, at the Yashwant International Film Festival in Mumbai.

The sixth edition of the festival, which concluded on Thursday, was a joint venture of the Yashwantrao Chavan Pratishthan and the Pune Film Foundation.

“This award will always be special as I was blessed with two opportunities to meet Chavan sir [Yashwantrao Chavan, the first Chief Minister of Maharashtra) in Mumbai and Delhi. And when I am presented with an award in this film festival named after him, I really feel honoured that my work in the past 50 years is recognised and being appreciated till today,” Waheeda said. — PTI
title: Award for Waheeda
